description:
口语练习1
Would you please tel! me your target price?
能否告诉我贵方的目标价格是多少?
Would you please tell me your target price?
能否告诉我贵方的目标价格是多少?
It can not be higher than $50 per set.
每套不能高于50美金。
The attachment is our target prices.
附件为我们的目标价格。
Our target price is USD 1.5 to 2.
我们的目标价格是1.5到2美元。
口语练习2
Any wholesale prices for big quantity?
批量价格是多少?
Any wholesale prices for big quantity?
批量价格是多少?
It depends on the quantity.
这个要看数量多少。
If we order 10,000，what would be your offer?
如果我们订10000件，责方报价是多少?
What's the price for 1000kg of white sugar?
1000公斤白糖的价格是多少?
If our order is a substantial one, how much will you bring your price down?
如果我们的订量很大，你们可以降价多少？
